name: Brian Lara International Cricket 2007
synopsis: Brian Lara International Cricket 2007 is the follow up to the best-selling 2005 title. The 2005 revival of the series became the first cricket title to ever make Number 1 in Chart Track's All Formats UK best-seller list. The game won over a huge army of fans thanks to its authentic and hugely entertaining game-play and held a 4-week run as the UK's number one best-seller.  Brian Lara International Cricket 2007 is set for release in March 2007 to coincide with the ICC Cricket World Cup 2007 and will lead with a dedicated ICC Cricket World Cup 2007 game mode featuring all the official teams, real player names and likenesses, kits and venues of the tournament.
